Reviews.Title: Erroneous technical data. Phone is not compatible with 3G/LTE for AT&T; or T-Mobile in the US
Reviews.Author: Dr. Pep
Reviews.Content: According to the LG web site, this phone's 3G is UMTS 900/2100 MHz only. AT&T; operates in 1900 and 850 MHz bands, and T-mobile operates in 1700/2100 AWS bands.This phone's LTE bands are 800/1800/2600MHz while AT&T; LTE operates in the 700mhz band and T-mobile operates in the 1700 MHz band.This phone is not compatible with either AT&T; or T-Mobile in the US.

Reviews.Title: No data
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get this phone. All the right frequencies and amazing specs (4G!!!) for the price.  I received it and it looked great, but, it is a Scandinavian phone.  The manual is in Swedish, Norwegian, Danish and Finnish.  The USB charge adaptor has a European plug.  No problem, I found an English language manual online and I have several USB charge adaptors.I charged the phone completely as the manual directs, and finally got to put in my SIM.  The problem came up during set-up.  No data connection.  I bailed out of set-up and went into settings, as we have several android phones and tablets, so I know my way around the OS.  The device could see the T-Mobile and AT&T; networks, but couldn't connect at any speed, 4G, 3G or GPRS/EDGE.  I didn't bother with Wi-Fi, as I wanted 3G/4G.  I did verify it could make a voice call.I'm very disappointed, but back in the box it goes.  This is only my third return in many years of being an Amazon prime customer, so I don't fault Amazon.  These aren't intended for North America and the vendor shouldn't sell them here.

Reviews.Title: This phone exceeded my expectation
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan
Reviews.Content: This phone is so easy to use and fast as well.Its design is nice.Its screen are so clear and bright.Its sound is good enough.It works with my GSM network (T-Mobile)Its features are great for its price.I recommended it for anyone who wants affordable smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great handset!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy S. Kagan
Reviews.Content: This far exceeds my expectations.  Performance is great.  The screen is clear and responsive.  Battery life is decent.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I love it... great phone
Reviews.Author: S. Delgadillo
Reviews.Content: I love it... great phone. Its great size, light, impress desing, excellent looks. Great performance...Excellent buy... Excellent....FabolousExcellent Phone

Reviews.Title: Good purches
Reviews.Author: Edwin Decena
Reviews.Content: So far berry happy whith the purches... I know my friend will liked the phone... excellent quality. Exlellent servis. If you like this phone.. by it.

Reviews.Title: great phone but ,,,,,
Reviews.Author: nizmo
Reviews.Content: this is a great phone if i could get it to work with at&t; gophone network and yes i have data plan . i even brang it to att store to see if they could get it to work but they couldnt . other than that its a great phone im lucky i have wifi at work and at home so not having 4g lte aint a big deal unless im using google maps. but i have rooted my device and im loving it . the sceen is the best feature i love the viewing angles and how nice the text is when im viewing web pages . battery life is also great. i charge it over night wake at 4am and finish work get home around 5pm and i have anywhere from 50-65 percent battery life left .

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900; 3G Data: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1700 / 1900 / 2100; 4G Data: LTE 800 / 1800 / 2600
Android OS, v2.3.6 (Gingerbread); CPU: Dual-core 1.5 GHz Scorpion; cHIPSET: Qualcomm APQ8060 Snapdragon
4.5" True HD-IPS LCD capacitive multi-touchscreen, 16M color
8MP camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, face and smile detection + Secondary 1.3MP camera
Wi-Fi; Bluetooth v3.0; GPS (with A-GPS support); microSD Slot expandable up to 32 GB
ProductInfo.Name: LG Optimus TrueHD LTE P936 Black Factory Unlocked
